Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=5.5 µg/ml), Bacillus pyocyaneus CMCCB 10104 (MIC=22 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=11 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=11 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented

Literature.Title: Lividins novel antimicrobial peptide homologs from the skin secretion of the Chinese Large Odorous frog, Rana (Odorrana) livida. Identification by shotgun cDNA cloning and sequence analysis.
Literature.Author: Zhou M, Chen T, Walker B, Shaw C.

Literature.Title: Extremely abundant antimicrobial peptides existed in the skins of nine kinds of Chinese odorous frogs.
Literature.Author: Yang X, Lee WH, Zhang Y.
